name: Colorlinez: FREE classical addictive lines game
name_original: Colorlinez: FREE classical addictive lines game
description:
Colorlinez Pro is the best classical board & puzzle game. Simple and easy to play. Honor to the classic puzzle PC-game “Winlinez”, new elements has been added to enrich your game experience.

*ONE basic rule:
Move the balls around the board to get five of the same color in a line, causing them to be removed from the board. If no balls are removed after a move, more balls will appear on the board. Just challenge a high score before the board is full of balls!

*TWO new modes:
Two more brand new game modes are added, besides the Classic Mode which is paying tribute to the classic puzzle game “Winlinez”.
-the Normal Mode, which is suitable for new players. No time limit in this mode, Rainbow Balls and Bomb Balls are refreshed. It is a simple mode good for relaxation.
-the Time Mode, which is high-rhythm and exciting. Challenge a high score within a one-minute time limit! Coins are rewarded after each Time Mode game according to the score.

*High Score Tips:
Color pieces can be link-to-remove by vertical, horizontal and diagonal.
Less move, more combos.
Try to put the pieces of the same color together in advance.
Good luck!
